original_title: Sorry You're Watching This: Viper & Solo Darling
overview: We apologize in advance of you viewing this show because they talk about some pretty weird S#!t on this inaugural episode of "Sorry You're Watching This" hosted by  Dan Barry. Yeah we couldn't find anyone else at the moment to host this show so Dan was hanging out and we needed someone. Again we apologize.  Either way it's a really great show featuring two of the best wrestlers in the world, Solo Darling and Viper. It's just three gals...I mean two gals and Dan talking about  wrestling and haggis. Trust us... you might enjoy it!
title: Sorry You're Watching This: Viper & Solo Darling
